title: FS: Pelty Fitzgerald F Stamp with Fingerprint in the Ink - sold
author: Jobu

posts.post_title: FS: Pelty Fitzgerald F Stamp with Fingerprint in the Ink - sold
posts.post_content:
Sold. Thanks for looking.

This card has a clear fingerprint in the ink, pretty cool if the F Scott Fitzgerald story is ever proved. The card is the vertical Pelty, slabbed a PSA 4 (mk) with an Old Mill back.

$325 shipped & insured, Paypal F & F. A promise to buy trumps all on-going negotiations.

Please send me a message with your email address if you would like a scan.

Thanks.
Good luck with the sale.  From what I recall, it's a beautiful card.
Thanks Chris. I like the card too but recently picked up another F stamp I like better so it is time to send Pelty to a new home.
Bump for a cut. I am now losing a little $ on this one but I need the cash for the National and, hopefully, for Leon's auction.
